titleStmt.title: The glorie of the latter temple greater then of the former Opened in a sermon preached at the consecration or restitution of the Parish Church of Flixton in the island of Louingland in the county of Suffolke; being sometimes the mother church of the East-Angles. 11. March. 1630 / By Iohn Brinsley.
titleStmt.author: Brinsley, John, 1600-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Miller] for Robert Bird, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Bible in Saint Laurence-lane,
